translation:
I participate in Your Excellency at the Jacuí River commanded by Furriel Joaquim Rodrigues, since the plan was thwarted because the rebel Manuel Alz. marched with all his force to the coast of the Jacuí River.

The rebel José Romão Taborda, captured in the previous sortie, was handed over to the order of Your Excellency.
